last_episode_to_air.name: The Thunder Games
last_episode_to_air.overview: Max and Phoebe advance to the final tryout for a spot on an elite superhero squad, but a new super villain with a surprise connection to the Thunderman family may force them to sacrifice their crime fighting dream.

name: The Thundermans
overview: Meet The Thundermans, a typical suburban family that happens to have astounding superpowers. At the center of the action are the 14-year-old Thunderman twins, who share the same bathroom, the same school, and the same annoying little siblings. Their only difference? The sister is a super student with a super sunny disposition who super looks forward to being a superhero someday, and her twin brother is a super villain.

episodes.name: Adventures in Supersitting
episodes.overview: Phoebe and Max Thunderman have to babysit their younger siblings, Billy and Nora Thunderman, while their parents, Hank and Barb go out to dinner. Phoebe invites her best friend Cherry over and accidentally exposes the families super power abilities. Meanwhile, Hank and Barb are out for dinner and Hank (Thunderman) has to replace a party entertainer.

episodes.name: Phoebe vs. Max
episodes.overview: A prank war between Max and Phoebe gets out of hand when Max pranks his sister on picture day at school and she finally decides to take on the family's troublemaker once and for all.

episodes.name: Dinner Party
episodes.overview: A family dinner with Phoebe's new crush goes awry when an uninvited guest crashes the festivities.

episodes.name: Report Card
episodes.overview: Max alters his report card and gets into an advanced class, where he battles Phoebe in a math bowl. Elsewhere, the family try to trap a newspaper bandit.

episodes.name: Ditch Day
episodes.overview: Max and Phoebe create some fun for themselves on Ditch Day.

episodes.name: This Looks Like a Job For
episodes.overview: The teens work at pizza shop and try to impress their boss, but Max gets in over his head and must join forces with Phoebe in order to fulfill a large order.

episodes.name: Weekend Guest
episodes.overview: Phoebe volunteers to take home the class's Venus flytrap for the weekend; Max performs an experiment on a plant, causing it to grow continuously.

episodes.name: You Stole My Thunder, Man
episodes.overview: Phoebe plots revenge when Max wins the school election that she had been working for.

episodes.name: Weird Science Fair
episodes.overview: Billy and Nora’s science fair reignites an old rivalry in Phoebe and Max. Elsewhere, Barb attempts to catch Hank copying her book-club notes.

episodes.name: Crime After Crime
episodes.overview: Hank creates a neighborhood watch group when crimes start happening. Max takes the blame for the mysterious crimes to hide his own secret, but Phoebe knows he is innocent and it's up to the family to catch the real criminal.

episodes.name: Going Wonkers
episodes.overview: A comet makes the Thundermans' powers go wonky just as Phoebe's crush asks her to a school dance. phoebe and Max learn if they stick together they can keep their powers in check, but neither is too happy having the other around.

episodes.name: Restaurant Crashers
episodes.overview: When the children ruin Hank's anniversary gift for Barb,they enlist the help of a family friend to help them fix it.

episodes.name: Thundersense
episodes.overview: Phoebe gets the ability to sense danger and uses it to impress her classmates; Max tries to get pity gifts from Barb.

episodes.name: Phoebe's a Clone Now
episodes.overview: When Phoebe commits herself to too many activities, Max helps her by creating a clone.

episodes.name: Have an Ice Birthday
episodes.overview: Phoebe and Max wants to have a normal teenage birthday party; Mrs. Wong goes missing.

episodes.name: Nothing to Lose Sleepover
episodes.overview: Phoebe is caught using telekinesis to save her first sleepover from becoming a disaster; Phoebe must wear an anklet that prevents her from using her powers.

episodes.name: Pretty Little Choirs
episodes.overview: Max and Phoebe work together to get even with a mean girl at school.

episodes.name: Paging Dr. Thundermans
episodes.overview: Max and Phoebe take Billy to the hospital when he hurts his thumb; Max faints when he sees a needle.

episodes.name: Up Up and Vacay
episodes.overview: When the family can’t agree on where to go for their dream vacation, they enter a competition as two different teams, boys vs girls, with the winners getting to decide.

episodes.name: Breaking Dad
episodes.overview: Hank falls asleep having eating special turkey sandwiches as he teaches at Max and Phoebe’s school.

episodes.name: Thunder Van
episodes.overview: The kids take a joyride in the Thundervan prompting Hank to teach them a lesson. Billy swears he didn't push anything when things go wonkers. Meanwhile, Barb and Nora have a tea party outside.

episodes.name: Four Supes and a Baby
episodes.overview: The children wind up bringing home a real baby instead of Nora's doll when Phoebe drags Billy and Nora to the park to meet her crush and his baby brother.

episodes.name: Max's Minions
episodes.overview: Max takes on some freshmen to be his new minions. He becomes the victim of humiliation.

episodes.name: Pheebs Will Rock You
episodes.overview: Phoebe tries to turn herself into a bad girl to impress Max's new best friend, a rocker who is in Max's new band.

episodes.name: Haunted Thundermans Part 1 (I)
episodes.overview:
After a super-villain escapes Ghost World on Halloween, the Thundermans head to New Orleans to join forces with the Hathaways and the Prestons to defeat the ghoul. However, saving the day gets complicated when super-powered trick-or-treating, sibling jealousy and teen romance get in the way.

The crossover continues on The Haunted Hathaways S02E09 Haunted Thundermans Part 2 (II).

episodes.name: Shred It Go
episodes.overview: Phoebe is devastated when she thinks the family's new shredder has accidentally destroyed her MKTO concert tickets, not realizing that Max actually has them and is secretly planning to take his crush to the concert. Guest Stars: MKTO, Sydney ParkSource: Cartoon Network

episodes.name: Blue Detective
episodes.overview: When Max's skin turns blue while out on a date, everybody becomes a suspect as he turns super-sleuth in an effort to find out whodunnit.

episodes.name: Cheer and Present Danger
episodes.overview: Phoebe and Cherry find their friendship tested when only one of them makes the cheer squad.

episodes.name: Change of Art
episodes.overview: Billy helps Phoebe out on a art project, but she soon learns the piece has come from a museum.

episodes.name: Winter Thunderland
episodes.overview: Max receives a visit from the Ghosts of Christmas Past, Present and Future on Christmas Eve.

episodes.name: Parents Just Don't Thunderstand
episodes.overview: Phoebe and Max use one of his devices to make Hank and Barb act like teenagers, but the siblings quickly grow to regret their actions.

episodes.name: Meet the Evilmans
episodes.overview: When a retired super-villain, Thunder Man's old nemesis Evilman moves to Hiddenville, Phoebe secretly begins dating his son.

episodes.name: The Neverfriending Story
episodes.overview: When Phoebe and Max's friends begin spending time with each other, the twins worry.

episodes.name: You've Got Fail
episodes.overview: Max tries to win an epic-fail video contest by submitting a video of Phoebe as she practices ballet.

episodes.name: Doubles Trouble
episodes.overview: Phoebe enlists Max's help in a tennis tournament in order to win a membership at a country club.

episodes.name: Who's Your Mommy
episodes.overview: Max and Phoebe accidentally sell one of Barb's old superhero utility belts to an Electress fan at the family's garage sale.

episodes.name: The Amazing Rat Race
episodes.overview: Max turns Billy into the world's fastest rat in order to win the rat races that he has with members of his band.

episodes.name: Mall Time Crooks
episodes.overview: Phoebe and Max head out on a trip to the mall to buy Hank's birthday gift and end up having a run-in with security.

episodes.name: It's Not What You Link
episodes.overview: Phoebe's plan to get Max and Link to be friends backfires when Link starts spending more time with Max than her.

episodes.name: Cape Fear
episodes.overview: Phoebe and Max Thunderman seem to be regular teenage twins, but they're in a family of superheroes. Phoebe strives to be normal and use her powers for good, but Max embraces the dark side. Can life ever be normal in this family?

episodes.name: Call of Lunch Duty
episodes.overview: Phoebe discovers that Max is the person behind the latest rebellious pranks at school.

episodes.name: One Hit Thunder
episodes.overview: Max causes a rift between Phoebe and Link when he uses personal information about them in a song.

episodes.name: The Girl with the Dragon Snafu
episodes.overview: Phoebe joins the cool group for a class project, but discovers that they do not want to work.

episodes.name: A Hero Is Born
episodes.overview: Phoebe and Cherry's friendship is tested when the Thunderman family gets some unexpected news.

episodes.name: Phoebe vs. Max: The Sequel
episodes.overview: Phoebe's first assignment as a superhero is to protect Hiddenville; Phoebe challenges Max to inject some mischief into their sleepy hometown.

episodes.name: On the Straight and Arrow
episodes.overview: Cherry asks Max to use his superpowers to help her get her driver's license; Phoebe's jealousy threatens her relationship with her best friend.

episodes.name: Why You Buggin'?
episodes.overview: Link and Phoebe have their six-month anniversary, but when Phoebe finds out Link's ex-girlfriend Quinn is a bug villain, Phoebe decides to set up Max and Quinn to reveal Quinn's identity.

episodes.name: Exit Stage Theft
episodes.overview: Max tries to reestablish his evil reputation by committing crimes; Max must choose between his friends and his reputation.

episodes.name: Are You Afraid of the Park?
episodes.overview: Max and Phoebe start a fight between Billy and Nora so they can avoid riding a scary roller coaster, but their scheme backfires when the feud escalates.

episodes.name: Patch Me If You Can
episodes.overview: Phoebe decides to babysit Link's brother so Link can get his surprise party ready for him. Phoebe and Max run into a problem when Link's brother wears Max's evil eye patch and need to get him back to normal. Meanwhile, Nora almost hits Chloe when she is doing trick shots and is afraid to use her powers.

episodes.name: Give Me a Break-Up
episodes.overview: Phoebe is sick of hanging out with Link all the time and tries to find him a hobby. They finally find him being a super hero and is happy. However, Link is sent somewhere else and Phoebe doesn't want Link to go. So, she tries to have one final night to hopefully change his mind. Meanwhile, Max needs Billy and Nora to help him make chilly better than Mrs. Wong on a TV show cook off.

episodes.name: No Country for Old Mentors
episodes.overview: Despite hoping to be matched with her favorite hero in the Superhero Mentor Program, Phoebe feels pressure to choose her father instead.

episodes.name: Date Expectations
episodes.overview: Phoebe distracts Max from interfering with her class project by convincing him that a girl at school wants to date him.

episodes.name: He Got Game Night
episodes.overview: When Hank raises the stakes of family game night to a new high, each member of the family will do whatever it takes to win the grand prize.

episodes.name: Kiss Me Nate
episodes.overview: Max is nervous when his girlfriend auditions for the romantic lead in the school play opposite a cute boy, so he convinces Phoebe to audition for the same role.

episodes.name: Dog Day After-School
episodes.overview: Billy and Nora seek Phoebe's help to retrieve their mother's tablet after it is confiscated at school

episodes.name: Original Prankster
episodes.overview: Despite promising his girlfriend that he would stop pulling pranks, Max pulls an epic gag that his friend gets blamed for.

episodes.name: Chutes and Splatters
episodes.overview: Phoebe must baby-sit President Kuckbutt's troublemaking teen daughter as her latest superhero mission, but the assignment quickly gets out of control

episodes.name: Can't Spy Me Love
episodes.overview: Unexpected consequences arise when Phoebe uses the Hero League's villain search software to track down a cute boy.

episodes.name: Aunt Misbehavin
episodes.overview: Max and Phoebe surprise their mother by tracking down her long lost sister, only to find the sisters had been feuding for years.

episodes.name: Stealing Home
episodes.overview: Hank and Phoebe think their house has been robbed when they return home and discover the furniture is missing

episodes.name: Back to School
episodes.overview: Phoebe and Max return to their elementary school to complete a hero assessment exam and discover that the instructor is a former classmate that Max tormented.

episodes.name: Thundermans: Secret Revealed
episodes.overview: After living a double secret for years, the Thundermans' secret is revealed.

episodes.name: Happy Heroween
episodes.overview: It’s a major Halloween storm outside, but inside Colosso keeps the family spooked by telling three scary stories that are sure to terrify even the bravest of superheroes.

episodes.name: Thundermans: Banished!
episodes.overview: The Thundermans are forced to relocate to another city after their secret is revealed. However, when a new threat rises in Hiddenville, Phoebe and Max risk everything in order to save Hiddenville.

episodes.name: Smells Like Team Spirit
episodes.overview: Max has been missing a lot of shows with his band! It's too bad he can't tell them that he had a Z-Force duty, they would never understand.

episodes.name: Max to the Future
episodes.overview: Concerned that he isn't considered a valuable superhero, Max creates a machine that can predict future crimes. But when it doesn't work, he spins a web of lies to keep the truth from Phoebe.

episodes.name: Better Off Wed
episodes.overview: The kids learn that Dr. Colosso ruined their parents' wedding years earlier, and want to recreate Hank & Barb's dream day as their anniversary gift. However, Dr. Colosso remains a threat, and they must keep their plans a secret.

episodes.name: Parks & T-Rex
episodes.overview: Preoccupied with Z-Force training, Phoebe & Max learn that they’ve forgotten special family events. Wanting to make it up Phoebe plans a family fun day. But when things go awry, she stops at nothing to make it the best day ever.

episodes.name: Date of Emergency
episodes.overview: Phoebe feels left out in relationships since both Max and Cherry are in relationships. So, she creates a lie to fake romance but keeping it proves to be very difficult.

episodes.name: Orange Is the New Max
episodes.overview: Phoebe worries that Max will revert to his evil ways after he is asked to give a "Scared Straight" talk to a group of young supervillains in prison, but her efforts to protect Max from himself end up doing more harm than good.

episodes.name: Ditch Perfect
episodes.overview: When Phoebe learns Max's band plans to dump him, she suspects that his superhero training is hurting his friendships. Determined to help, she attempts to repair things with the band, but her good deeds quickly backfire.

episodes.name: May Z-Force Be With You
episodes.overview: Max and Phoebe ask Cherry to secretly fill-in after Phoebe injures herself the night before a meeting with the Z-Force, but a superhero emergency tests their scheme and the twins' future as crimefighters.

episodes.name: 21 Dump Street
episodes.overview: After Max is dumped, Phoebe tries to cheer him up by introducing him to another girl, but Max's date turns out to be an intense animal activist who thinks he treats Dr. Colosso cruelly.

episodes.name: Super Dupers
episodes.overview: Max and Phoebe use their powers to give their friend a confidence boost, but the gesture backfires when he recklessly starts to think he that he has superpowers of his own.

episodes.name: Come What Mayhem
episodes.overview: Phoebe makes a life-altering decision when her powers combined with Max's powers are not enough to stop one of Max's old pranks from ruining a superhero gathering.

episodes.name: Thunder in Paradise
episodes.overview: The Thundermans travel to Hawaii for summer vacation, but there is trouble in paradise as Phoebe inadvertently has absorbed Dark Mayhem's evil powers, and now is determined to complete his plan for world domination.

episodes.name: Save the Past Dance
episodes.overview: Tired of hearing tales of Hiddenville's legendary mayor, the kids use a time machine to travel back 60 years to disprove the myths; but when they inadvertently alter the past, the effect spells disaster for their hometown.

episodes.name: Z's All That
episodes.overview: Phoebe and Max act as a superhero mentors to one of their siblings but quickly regret selecting Nora after seeing Billy's surprisingly impressive skills.

episodes.name: Can't Hardly Date
episodes.overview: Sarah and Gideon are set up on a date by Max and Phoebe. However, when Max discovers Sarah’s uncle is a rock star, he wants to win her back.

episodes.name: Revenge of the Smith
episodes.overview: Excited to be honored for their heroism with a school mural, Phoebe and Max learn that the artist holds a personal grudge, and the tribute isn’t what they imagined.

episodes.name: Nowhere to Slide
episodes.overview: The Thunder family splits up for the night; the boys decide to survive 24 hours in the wilderness, while the girls try to bond over some of Barb's favorite farm activities from her childhood.

episodes.name: Significant Brother
episodes.overview: Sparks fly between Phoebe and Cherry's visiting brother, prompting Cherry to grow concerned that she will be overshadowed by this new romance; after Cherry begs Phoebe not to date her brother, Phoebe must decide between love and friendship.

episodes.name: Rhythm n' Shoes
episodes.overview: Determined to meet a famous pop singer visiting Hiddenville High, Phoebe and Max devise elaborate schemes to insert themselves into her performance that quickly lead to disastrous results.

episodes.name: Make it Pop Pop
episodes.overview: Nana and Pop Pop Thunderman come to visit, but when Phoebe reveals Colosso is living in their house, Pop Pop's no-tolerance attitude toward supervillains leads him to banish Max and his bunny best friend to the Detention Zone.

episodes.name: Side-Kicking and Screaming
episodes.overview: Max & Phoebe secretly employ their parents' former sidekick to ease their busy schedule, but the twins' bickering and inability to share provokes an unexpected response from their new sidekick.

episodes.name: Cookie Mistake
episodes.overview: After Phoebe chooses Billy to accompany her to their favorite cookie factory's exclusive tasting event, Max and Nora are determined to sneak in and get to the delicious treats first.

episodes.name: All the President's Thunder-Men
episodes.overview: After their requests drive Kickbutt to quit, Max and Phoebe get what they want when Hank is named the new SuperPresident; being the First Family of the Hero League takes its toll on the family.

episodes.name: Mad Max: Beyond Thunderhome
episodes.overview: Max finally declares his independence from his parents' house rules and moves to his friend's house, where they only rule is that there are no rules; ultimate freedom quickly becomes more than Max can handle.

episodes.name: The Thundredth
episodes.overview: Phoebe and Max are determined to make their 100th save their best and most memorable one yet, but by ignoring a series of small saves they overlook a supervillain plotting revenge on Hank and Barb.

episodes.name: Looperheroes
episodes.overview: The Z-Force gives Max and Phoebe a superhero day off, but when they relive the day over and over again, they must find a way to break the loop.

episodes.name: The Thunder Games
episodes.overview: Max and Phoebe advance to the final tryout for a spot on an elite superhero squad, but a new super villain with a surprise connection to the Thunderman family may force them to sacrifice their crime fighting dream.
